title: Bug 6410 - File unchanged but dirtied by code assist
description: Bug 6410 - File unchanged but dirtied by code assist
OB: When using code assist, the file is marked as dirty even though no changes have been made. Additionally, code assist does not appear.
EB: The file should only be marked as dirty when actual changes have been made. Code assist should also appear as expected.
SR:
To reproduce the issue:
1. Open the file in the integrated development environment (IDE).
2. Enable code assist feature.
3. Start typing without making any actual changes to the file.
4. Observe that the file is marked as dirty and code assist does not appear.
